DOC.brief_summary: This is a Phase II open-label trial evaluating the efficacy, and safety of Erbitux in patients with mucinous gastrointestinal adenocarcinoma involving the peritoneal surface.
DOC.brief_title: A Trial of Erbitux for Recurrent and Metastatic Mucinous Gastrointestinal Adenocarcinoma Involving the Peritoneal Surfaces
DOC.criteria: Able to take care of self. Out of bed less than 50% of the day Absolute neutrophil count >=1,500 Platelet count >=100,000 Total bilirubin count <=1.5 times the upper limit of normal Prior epidermal growth factor receptor antibody Prior treatment with Erbitux Other cancers
